derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French béret 'Basque cap', from Old Provençal berret, based on late Latin birrus 'hooded cape'. Compare with biretta

entry.tran: 贝雷帽（一种扁圆的无沿软帽）
entry.def: A beret is a circular, flat hat that is made of soft material and has no brim.

means.word_mean: 1. a cap with no brim or bill; made of soft cloth
